column2: News;Phnom Penh is facing a massive pollution problem because of the widespread use of plastic packaging and poor waste management services.------Plastic does not biodegrade easily
column3: staying around for hundreds of years and slowly leaking harmful chemicals into the environment.------There are dire consequences for the local population: on one hand
column4: their health suffers due to garbage piled up in the streets and drainage systems clogged with waste
column5: while a drop in tourists is hurting the economy there.------The government has introduced a plastic bag tax and environmental groups are working on other innovative new solutions.------http://www.euronews.com/2018/09/03/cambodia-s-plastic-problems
